bibl.title: The Courts are no more.
Studi in onore di Edoardo Volterra. I
bibl.author: Schiller, A. Arthur

bibl.note: State litigation was absent, and private arbitration paramount, for the settlement of civil disputes for at least a century and a half before the Arab conquest of Egypt.
Schiller A. Arthur, The Courts are no more.
Studi in onore di Edoardo Volterra. I (Milano, 1971) pp. 469-502.
